attributes.action: Equal minimum wage for all age groups
attributes.additional_details: Why should workers under 18 be paid £3.68 an hour for the same amount of work and hours that a worker of over 21 years of age does? All age groups (16 years old +) should be paid the current amount of £6.19 an hour, as the workers do all the same amount and level of work and should not be discriminated due to their age.
